backend.invalidAid: AID entered is not available. Please check your AID before entering

DownloadingVcModal.bodyText: This may take some time, we will notify you when your {{vcLabel}} has been downloaded and is available

GetIdInputModal.header: Enter your Application ID to get your UIN
GetIdInputModal.qstnMarkToolTip: Application ID is available in the acknowledgement received after enrolment.

IdInputModal.header: Enter your UIN/VID to download your {{vcLabel}}
IdInputModal.noUIN/VID: Don't have your UIN/VID? Get it here

OtpVerificationModal.enterOtp: Enter the 6-digit verification code we sent you

MyVcsTab.generateVcDescription: Tap on "Add {{vcLabel}}" below to download your {{vcLabel}}

OnboardingOverlay.stepOneText: Keep your digital credential with you at all times. To get started, add {{vcLabel}} to your profile.
OnboardingOverlay.stepTwoText: Once generated, {{vcLabel}} are safely stored on your mobile and can be renamed or shared at any time.
OnboardingOverlay.stepThreeText: Share and receive {{vcLabel}} switfly using your phone camera to scan QR codes.

ReceivedVcsTab.noReceivedVcsText: Tap on Request below to receive {{vcLabel}}

ViewVcModal.revoking: Your wallet contains a credential with VID {{vid}}. Revoking this will automatically remove the same from the wallet. Are you sure you want to proceed?

success.revoked: VID {{vid}} has been revoked. Any credential containing the same will be removed automatically from the wallet

PasscodeScreen.header: Set a passcode to secure your application

ProfileScreen.name: Name
ProfileScreen.revokingVids: You are about to revoke ({{count}}) VIDs.
ProfileScreen.revokingVidsAfter:
This means you will no longer be able to use or view any of the IDs linked to those VID(s). 
Are you sure you want to proceed?

QrScreen.alignQr: Align the QR code within the frame to scan
QrScreen.checkDomain: Also, check that there is a lock icon on the address bar.
